# pyau

**pyau** is a Python library that mimics Luau syntax.

âœ¨ Inspired by Roblox Lua, but runs on Python.

---

## ðŸš€ Features

âœ… `table` utilities (`insert`, `remove`, `foreach`)  
âœ… Luau-style functions (`typeof`, `ipairs`, `pairs`, `wait`)  
âœ… Roblox-like event system (`Event`, `.Connect()`, `.Fire()`, `.Disconnect()`)  
âœ… Metatable support (`__index`, `__newindex`)  
âœ… Coroutine system (`create`, `resume`, `yield_`, `status`)
